title: [Self-Directed] Prior Technology Investigation Workflow to Strengthen Engineering Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic engineering design concepts, ability to interpret patents and technical documentation
context.additional_context: Focused on acquiring preliminary technical research methods required for engineering design processes, targeting office/administrative working professionals, with actual industrial field simulations conducted in VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically search for relevant prior art in patent databases and technical literature
Learners can analyze similarities between 3D models/prototypes and prior art in VR simulation environments
Learners can present innovative design improvement proposals based on prior art investigation results in team workshops

resources: Engineering online lecture modules (for flipped learning)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
